forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
